1448350.name: QUANTAAR
1448350.description:
Embark on a journey in QUANTAAR, where you act as the Observer and summon Heroes from different dimensions to engage in thrilling and fast-paced battles. With each Hero possessing distinct abilities, use the Core system to enhance their agility, firepower, and range, and become a master of combat.




Choose from a variety of Heroes with four classes - Fighter, Shooter, Generalist, and Assassin - each with their own unique skills and ultimate abilities to engage in thrilling battles. Take down your opponents and unleash devastating attacks with your Hero's ultimate move. Utilize Items strategically, such as throwing an Octopus to obstruct your opponent's vision or trapping their Heroes with an Ice Cube.




Explore different universes, from the icy mountains of Eternal Winter to the desolate lands of Desert Tombs and the high-tech relics of alien civilizations in the skies of Temple Ruins. Uncover secrets and employ new strategies to emerge victorious.




Join forces with your friends in QUANTAAR's 2v2 and Soccer Mode! Victory requires a combination of strategy and cooperation, as each hero brings their unique approach to the battle. Work together as a team to achieve success!


Experience thrilling battles with no limits alongside your friends! With cross-play multiplayer, playing QUANTAAR with your buddies is a breeze.




Meet new friends in the epic social-themed rooms! Each social room features a theme park where you can relax and hang out with friends playing mini-games. Host private events, style your avatar with preferred skins, and get ready to shine in the ultimate VR brawler!


Follow @QUANTAAR on Twitter for more info!
1448350.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语, 繁体中文, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
